meeting_request.purpose: Struggling to adjust to college and feeling overwhelmed
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Margaret, a first-year Chemistry major. I’ve taken a few classes and already feel like I’m behind, both academically and emotionally. I’m worried that I’ll fail this semester and feel like I’m not living up to what I’m doing. I’d like some support dealing with my anxiety and feeling isolated in my major. I’m in a good academic unit, but I’m not sure how to make friends or find a community that can help me. I’m excited to be in college, but I’m still feeling like an outsider.
